hero.title: System to Emotion.
hero.subtitle: Designing emotion through logic
hero.description: Completing user experiences through invisible structure.

achievements.title: Key Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Experiences contributing to team and business through problem-solving, collaboration, and growth

items.title: Discovered and resolved technical debt the team missed
content: Diagnosed that the Django+AngularJS hybrid structure was the root problem
items.point: Solved the root cause of 'hybrid architecture' rather than the surface symptom of 'slow speed'

items.title: Reflected business value in technical decisions
content: No FE modification needed when adding new resource types
Reduced customization time by 25% (1 week ‚Üí 4 days)
items.point: Architecture design considering scalability and business efficiency, not just feature implementation

items.title: Led collaboration across diverse roles
content: Participated from Backend API design stage
Reflected FE requirements in DB schema
Created Web FE characteristics manual for planners/designers
Reduced API integration errors, minimized rework
items.point: Led project success through smooth communication with all roles: design, planning, backend, QA

items.title: Team member growth and productivity improvement
content: Reduced onboarding time by 70% (2 weeks ‚Üí 3 days)
items.point: Built systematic knowledge sharing culture for team-wide growth, not just individual capability

items.title: Prioritized team success over personal success
content: Completed project closure responsibility even after PL departure
Improved team productivity with 100+ reusable components
Secured customer satisfaction with 1 year maintenance support
items.point: Ownership to take responsibility to the end for project success even in crisis situations

teamSays.title: What My Team Says
teamSays.subtitle: From the people who built with me.

quotes.text: Mi-hyeon demonstrates capabilities close to full-stack, understanding not only frontend but also backend and infrastructure. She quickly learns and applies new technologies, contributing to service quality improvement.
quotes.author: Dev Team Jang XX (Colleague for about 3 years)

quotes.text: She always has a sincere and considerate attitude that positively influences those around her. Her responsible and trustworthy personality is a great strength.
quotes.author: QA Team Park XX (Colleague for about 3 years)

quotes.text: She is a responsible developer who calmly identifies causes and finds solutions to the end even in unexpected problem situations.
quotes.author: Dev Team Jang XX (Colleague for about 3 years)

quotes.text: Even in difficult situations during projects, the way she completes things to the end with meticulousness and calmness was impressive.
quotes.author: Project Team Colleagues

cta.title: Let's Build Something Great.
mainMessage: I want to think together about how technology reaches people,
and build systems that are invisible but trustworthy.
subMessage: A developer who collaborates through structure and respects through speed.
I want to add that learning to your project now.
